flawed_nl_solution:
Tom will be 30 in 5 years so now he is 30-5 = <<30-5=25>>25
2 years ago Tom was 25-2 = <<25-2=23>>23
At that time, Jared was twice as old as Tom so Jared was 23*2 = 46
Two years have since passed so Jared is now 46+2 = <<46+2=43>>43
#### 43

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 48, not 43. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
